statements: SELECT * FROM account_balance;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balance;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balance WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM account_balance ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT AVG(balance) FROM account_balance;
SELECT * FROM account_balance ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balance WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT * FROM account_balance WHERE account_id = 1001
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balance GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 5000
SELECT * FROM account_balance WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 100 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT account_id, MAX(balance) AS max_balance, MIN(balance) AS min_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING average_transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM AccountBalances;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM AccountBalances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM AccountBalances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT * FROM Alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccountBalances WHERE account_id = 123;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM AccountBalances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type LIKE '%credit%' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance, last_updated FROM accounts ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance, last_updated FROM accounts WHERE balance < 500 OR account_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN accounts ON transactions.account_id = accounts.account_id WHERE account_name = 'Savings' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 5;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM account_balances ORDER BY account_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 1000;
SELECT transactions.account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions JOIN alerts ON transactions.account_id = alerts.account_id GROUP BY transactions.account_id;
SELECT user_id, name, phone_number, email FROM user_profile WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
